fields.name: AllowedAuthenticationType
fields.description: A value indicating the authentication type.

fields.name: ApplicationConsistentSnapshotFrequencyInHours
fields.description: A value indicating the application consistent frequency.

fields.name: Compression
fields.description: A value indicating whether compression has to be enabled.

fields.name: InitialReplicationMethod
fields.description: A value indicating whether IR is online.

fields.name: OfflineReplicationExportPath
fields.description: A value indicating the offline IR export path.

fields.name: OfflineReplicationImportPath
fields.description: A value indicating the offline IR import path.

fields.name: OnlineReplicationStartTime
fields.description: A value indicating the online IR start time.

fields.name: RecoveryPoints
fields.description: A value indicating the number of recovery points.

fields.name: ReplicaDeletionOption
fields.description: A value indicating whether the VM has to be auto deleted. Supported Values: String.Empty, None, OnRecoveryCloud

fields.name: ReplicationPort
fields.description: A value indicating the recovery HTTPS port.
